summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 10th Avenue Northeast in the City of Seattle, from East 65th Street to Sylvester Place, by grading and curbing the same, and by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, together with wood cross walks, and the necessary drainage, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 34300 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
